ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T17:07:03 [Issue ID 4000-108210] urn:comicvine:4000-108210 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 03:46:42. [Issue ID 242082]
ComicInfo.Summary: Pilgrim finally finds her way home after being lost in a number of alternate dimensions and is happy to see that her brother, Blackbird, is now a member of Wetworks. Waering tells the team that the child they were sent to protect last issue is still alive and they head out once again to save him from the Dopplers. During the ensuing battle, the team learns that Blackbird is a werewolf, as is Pilgrim (even though she doesn't know it). It is also confirmed that there is no longer a body under Jester's golden skin. Dane and Mother-One figure out who created the Dopplers.
